::Vamprah::

Vamprah was in state that among conceus and
incounceous.

But she didn't like death without fight, and  joined
all her scarces forces and tried to moved over knife's
way. But in her last moment, she failed and she wasn't
able to move any inches... 

"I won't beg for my life... I'm not afraid to die" she
said almost incounceous with a chalelling tone,
thinking that Darkfate was ready to kill her.

Her body tensed redy to recive the hit. she moved her
head in one side, as if she liked say "Hit here, I
don't care!!! Death doesn't scare me..."

--- logomorph@... wrote:
> Diamond::
> 
> She looked down at Vamprah.  She stared, looking at
> the necklace.
> She looked at Devilduer."I wonder, would putting her
> into a deep 
> stasis lock possably help her? I can' do that, but
> I'm not sure how 
> she would react to it.  See, my venom is designed to
> put the victim 
> into a very deep stasis in one bite. It's the second
> bite that kills. 
> So one bite might settle her down enough to were we
> can get that 
> thing off her. What do you say?"
>   
> 
>
